hieros

Holy (hiero as in Hieroglyphs, [[hieros gamos]])
Old γέρων, gero, ἱερόν, yearo [[𓇋]]𓄿𓅱𓏏𓀗, Hieros, Heros

ἱερός     sacred, holy
ἱερόν   a temple
ἱερωσύνης the priestly office
γέρωντος     an old man

[[𓋴]][[𓍿]][[𓎤]][[𓎟]] sacred oil
𓂦[[𓂋]] Dsr ~ D-cr ~ Sacre
